author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Apple, T-Mobile, Mastercard, Snap, CVS, Mondelez, Xerox, Gilead, Clorox, Allstate, Coors - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Wednesday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Up 3.5%: Apple said it would spend an additional $100 billion on stock buybacks, ramping up its payout to shareholders.
